title: Engineering Project - Myakiatto
description: Detection and georeferencing of landscape features from satellite images via image processing and AI. Complete pipeline: preprocessing, segmentation, matching, and geospatial post-processing.

title: Web Development - Personal Portfolio
description: Modern portfolio website: responsive design, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion animations, multilingual (FR/EN), and EmailJS integration.
highlights: Professional page structure and clean UX

title: 3D Reconstruction - Photogrammetry
description: 3D reconstruction and texturing from multi-view images. Implementation of SfM (Structure from Motion) and MVS (Multi-View Stereo) algorithms.

title: Desktop Application - Automated Processing
description: C++/Qt application for automated batch processing of medical images: segmentation, measurements, and PDF report generation.
